name: Fishing Buddy
description:
Display fishing info: time of day, list of catchable fish in the zone. 
Currently no way to display equipped bait & lure :( 
Only shows fish in Zones with fishing holes & World Class/Saltwater everywhere if selected. 
View future enhancements & current bugs @ https://github.com/EclipseTech/FishingBuddy/issues

account.details: Required to check for fishing achievements.

progression.details: Required to check for fishing achievements.
